endpoints.label: UniProt
endpoints.description: UniProt is a comprehensive resource for protein sequence and annotation data.

endpoints.label: Bgee
endpoints.description: Bgee is a database for retrieval and comparison of gene expression patterns across multiple animal species.

endpoints.label: Orthology MAtrix (OMA)
endpoints.description: OMA is a method and database for the inference of orthologs among complete genomes.
